mapper.select: SELECT A.id as 'ID' , A.year as 'YEAR' , A.review_name as 'REVIEW_NAME' , A.approval_status as 'APPROVAL_STATUS' , writer.id as 'WRITER_ID' , writer.employee_name as 'WRITER_NAME' , writer.employee_number as 'WRITER_NUMBER' , A.write_time as 'WRITE_TIME' , approver.id as 'APPROVER_ID' , approver.employee_name as 'APPROVER_NAME' , approver.employee_number as 'APPROVER_NUMBER' , A.approval_time as 'APPROVAL_TIME' FROM performance_review_goal as A JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 4) as writer ON A.writer_id = writer.id JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 3) as approver ON A.approver_id = approver.id WHERE A.writer_id = #{employeeId} ORDER BY A.write_time DESC

SELECT A.id as 'ID' , A.year as 'YEAR' , A.review_name as 'REVIEW_NAME' , A.approval_status as 'APPROVAL_STATUS' , writer.id as 'WRITER_ID' , writer.employee_name as 'WRITER_NAME' , writer.employee_number as 'WRITER_NUMBER' , A.write_time as 'WRITE_TIME' , approver.id as 'APPROVER_ID' , approver.employee_name as 'APPROVER_NAME' , approver.employee_number as 'APPROVER_NUMBER' , A.approval_time as 'APPROVAL_TIME' FROM performance_review_goal as A JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 4) as writer ON A.writer_id = writer.id JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 3) as approver ON A.approver_id = approver.id WHERE A.approver_id = #{employeeId} AND A.approval_status IN ('S', 'R', 'A', 'D') ORDER BY A.write_time DESC

SELECT A.id as 'ID' , A.year as 'YEAR' , A.review_name as 'REVIEW_NAME' , A.approval_status as 'APPROVAL_STATUS' , writer.id as 'WRITER_ID' , writer.employee_name as 'WRITER_NAME' , writer.employee_number as 'WRITER_NUMBER' , A.write_time as 'WRITE_TIME' , approver.id as 'APPROVER_ID' , approver.employee_name as 'APPROVER_NAME' , approver.employee_number as 'APPROVER_NUMBER' , A.approval_time as 'APPROVAL_TIME' FROM performance_review_goal as A JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 4) as writer ON A.writer_id = writer.id JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 3) as approver ON A.approver_id = approver.id WHERE A.id = #{id}
SELECT id , job_name , goal , metric , weight , plan , objection FROM goal_item WHERE goal_id = #{goal_id};

SELECT A.id as 'ID' , A.year as 'YEAR' , A.review_name as 'REVIEW_NAME' , A.approval_status as 'APPROVAL_STATUS' , writer.id as 'WRITER_ID' , writer.employee_name as 'WRITER_NAME' , writer.employee_number as 'WRITER_NUMBER' , A.write_time as 'WRITE_TIME' , approver.id as 'APPROVER_ID' , approver.employee_name as 'APPROVER_NAME' , approver.employee_number as 'APPROVER_NUMBER' , A.approval_time as 'APPROVAL_TIME' FROM performance_review_goal as A JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 4) as writer ON A.writer_id = writer.id JOIN (SELECT * FROM employee WHERE duties_id = 3) as approver ON A.approver_id = approver.id WHERE A.writer_id = #{writerId} AND A.year = #{year};
